CY.name: Shin Chan Vol. 4
CY.description: Rating suitable for 12 years and over. Shin Chan is the nickname of the hero, Shinnosuke Nohara. He is a foulmouthed, lively and tireless 5-year-old boy. He’s crazy about beautiful girls, chocolate cookies and the Ultra Hero series. Oh! And teasing his mother, Misae. He has the ability of finding the weak point of those around him and ridiculing them -family, schoolmates... he drives them all to despair! The whole neighborhood suffers at his hands! Contains the following episodes: Episode 15: Hey, It’s the Kasukabe Kids Detective Agency! Hey, It’s the Kasukabe Kids Detective Agency! 2 Hey, Beer is for Adults! Episode 16: Hey, I’m Helping a Foreigner! Hey, I’m Helping a Foreigner! 2 Hey, We’re Stuck in Traffic! Episode 17: Hey, We Are the Chushingura! 1 Hey, We Are the Chushingura! 2 Episode 18: Hey, Here’s our story of Grandfather Cherry Blossom! Hey, We Want to Go to a Hot Spring! Hey, Daddy is Real Fussy About his Bath! Episode 19: Hey, Life Doesn’t Always Go As Planned! Hey, We Watch “Mary, the Magician” on TV! Episode 20: Detective Nohara’s Cases: A Star Under Threat Detective Nohara’s Cases: Looking for the Murderers
